title: Understanding Variables
text: In research, variables are elements that can change or be changed. The independent variable is the one you manipulate to observe its effect on another variable.

title: Identifying the Independent Variable
text: Think about what you are changing in your experiment. This is the independent variable. It is what you control to see how it affects the dependent variable.

title: Relationship Between Variables
text: The independent variable is used to determine if it has an effect on the dependent variable. Consider how changing one might influence the other.

title: Defining the Independent Variable
text: The independent variable is the variable your research will manipulate to see potential relationships with dependent variables. Is this statement true or false?
